age_policy: People under 16 can use the club only under adult supervision or with a trainer.
app_help: If you have issues with the app, try updating to the latest version or contact reception.
bike_racks: Bike racks are available in front of the club. Please secure your bike with your own lock.

classes_booking: Group classes can be booked via the mobile app or by contacting reception.
classes_cancellation: Classes can be cancelled no later than 2 hours before the start. After that, a fee applies according to the price list.
classes_limit: Places in classes are limited. Bookings are processed on a first-come, first-served basis.
cleaning_breaks: Areas may be temporarily closed for cleaning. Information is provided in advance.
contract_freeze: You can freeze your contract once per year for up to 30 days. The freeze fee is 29 PLN.
contract_termination: Contract termination requires signing a form at reception. The notice period is 1 month.
contract_transfer: You can transfer your membership to another person for an administrative fee of 39 PLN.
entry_policy: Entry to the club is via the mobile app or a membership card. Each entry is recorded in the system.
equipment_rules: Please put equipment back after your workout and disinfect machines after use.

hours: The club is open Monday to Friday from 6:00 to 22:00, and on weekends from 8:00 to 20:00.
instructors: Information about instructors is available in the app or on the notice board near the fitness studio.
invoices: You can receive an invoice for your membership at reception or by email upon request.
kids_zone: The Kids Zone is open on Saturdays and Sundays from 10:00 to 18:00. Children must be accompanied by an adult.
language_switch: I can reply in Polish, English, or Arabic. Tell me which language you prefer.
locker_room: Lockers use a PIN code. If you forget your code, please contact reception.
lost_items: Lost items can be collected at reception. We keep them for 30 days.
maintenance: Current maintenance work and temporary area closures are posted on the notice board at the entrance and in the app.
membership_price: Monthly membership starts from 139 PLN. Quarterly and annual plans are also available, as well as discounts for students and seniors.
membership_types: We offer memberships: Open, Off-Peak, Pool+Gym, and Family. Details are available at reception and on our website.
parking: Members get 2 hours of free parking. Take a ticket at the entrance and keep it until you exit.
payments: We accept card payments, BLIK, and recurring payments.
personal_trainer: Personal training can be arranged at reception or by contacting a chosen trainer directly.
personal_trainer_prices: Personal training starts from 120 PLN per session. Packages at a lower price are available.
pool_hours: The pool is available daily from 6:00 to 21:30. The last entry is 45 minutes before closing.
rules: The club rules are available on our website and at reception.
safety: If you feel unwell or get injured, inform staff immediately. The AED defibrillator is located at reception.
sauna_hours: The sauna area is open from 14:00 to 22:00 on weekdays and from 10:00 to 20:00 on weekends.
